verses.roman:
cāturmāsya pūrṇa haila, bhaṭṭa-ājñā lañā
dakṣiṇa calilā prabhu śrī-raṅga dekhiyā

synonyms: cāturmāsya—the period of Cāturmāsya; pūrṇa haila—became completed; bhaṭṭa-ājñā lañā—taking permission from Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa; dakṣiṇa—south; calilā—proceeded; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śrī-raṅga dekhiyā—visiting Śrī Raṅga.
translation: When the period of Cāturmāsya was completed, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took permission to leave Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa, and after visiting Śrī Raṅga He proceeded further toward southern India.
